attributes.action: Ensure that any additional safety noise added to electric vehicles is generally pleasant for those likely to hear it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a great oportunity to reduce noise pollution ,and the associated stress and risks. Having considered possibilities ,I feel that something like the sound of horses hooves ,speeding and slowing ,would be both pleasant and safe ,as well as distinct from other ambient sounds .
